page.title: 01North Bradley Village
page.content:
{North Bradley}village is situated south of Trowbridge in the county of Wiltshire.It is a large village for the county of Wiltshire.There are{two {main roads}running through the village.The A351 Warminster and Trowbridge.The A361 from Frome to Devises by-passes Trowbridge via Southwick and North Bradley.
{North Bradley School}is over one hundred years old.The children who attend the school come from North Bradley,Heywood,Hawkridge and Yarnbrook.Opposite the School is an old{Church called St.Nicholas.}This is much older than the school and has had bits added to it over the years. Also there is a Baptist Chapel in the village.This is not even one hundred years old yet.
